ygData.subject: Re: Boat Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: Well - one can ALWAYS come up with something to justify... In the world of Norrath - all beings are born with this strange organ in their body that acts as a
ygData.messageBody:
Well - one can ALWAYS come up with something to justify...

In the world of Norrath - all beings are born with this strange organ in
their body that acts as a Universal Global Positioning System...

On a similar notion - how to you justify the fact that Ogre and Troll
Mommies teach their Ogre and Troll Babies to speech perfectly flawless
Human? The game calls it "Common" but since Humans start it as their only
language...

Slyde of Xegony
----- Original Message -----
From: Bob Stewart <bstewart@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 24, 1999 10:55 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Boat Problems


>
> In a similar vein to the discussion of bards wearing plate and other
> aspects of roleplaying, are there other hardheads out their who would
> rather drown than use /loc and numeric coordinates?
>
